mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employment_info (student_id, company, position, salary, employment_date, industry_id, province) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{company}, #{position}, #{salary}, #{employmentDate}, #{industryId}, #{province})

mapper.select: SELECT province as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM employment_info WHERE province IS NOT NULL GROUP BY province
SELECT i.name as name, COUNT(e.id) as value FROM employment_info e LEFT JOIN industries i ON e.industry_id = i.id GROUP BY i.name
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(employment_date, '%Y-%m') as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM employment_info WHERE employment_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(employment_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY name
SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employment_info WHERE salary IS NOT NULL
